name: Jared Gendron
title: Electrical Engineering Graduate
bio: My name is Jared Gendron and I'm an electrical engineer based in Vancouver, British Columbia. As a recent Electrical Engineering graduate from the University of British Columbia, I aim to leverage my knowledge to contribute highly to your organization. With a profound understanding of electrical systems, I possess strong analytical skills that aid in problem-solving. I seek to join a team of professionals in a dynamic work environment to enhance my skills and make a meaningful contribution to the company's growth.
